It only took me 22 years, but I finally played and finished Half-Life. I figured it was an essential piece of gaming, but I wondered how it would hold up after all these years... It absolutely blew me away. The game has aged wonderfully. You forget about the outdated graphics almost immediately. The atmosphere is amazing and had me on the edge of my seat. Next I must conquer HL2. [url]https://youtu.be/1e7qMp8uh-c[/url]
Classic first person shooter that led to successful franchise.  Difficult at times but with a sense of accomplishment,
Maybe the best game I've played in my life.

[h1] The Beginning of an amazing series [/h1]

[b]Half Life is an old but amazing game that shows that even in 2020, Graphics are not everything. The storyline is great And you have to think of Creative ways to get out of situations.  [/b]

â–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒ

[b] PROS: [/b] 

[list]
    [*] Amazing storyline
    [*] Great characters (even though they do not use many character models and do not have many voicelines)
    [*] Great Guns
    [*] Creative Puzzles
    [*] Fun and will have you playing for hours
[/list]

â–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒâ–ƒ

[b] CONS [/b] 

[list]
    [*] The game is old so it has some bugs, For example you can get stuck in elevators and have to restart the level 
    [*] Challenging for beginners 
[/list]

This game was so addicting I beat it in 2 days and half the game was me saving and the other half I was confused wtf was going on. 10/10

This is the first first-person shooter I ever played for more than an hour because this game man..... it's amazing. Such an amazing game even though this was Valve's first game. This deserves all the game of the year awards.

Edit: Xen sucks

For being a game all the way from 1998, this game has aged very well. Though the gun play is a bit standard and bland, the gameplay, weapon progression, level design and story are all very good. If you are planning to buy this, I reccomend you do, even if it is from 1998.

Game is for the old school Kidults. Light on systems requirements.

Para decir la verdad un muy buen juego para pasartelo tantas veces sin aburrirte, tiene una muy buena historia y expansiones de las mejores,su jugabilidad nunca es repetitiva y no te aburres tan facilmente, aunque sus graficos no sean la gran cosa,  es muy bueno puedes jugar a este juego con un pc de bajos recursos y sus mods por dios lo hacen mas bueno, nada mas que decir, lo unico malo es su inicio,muy lento y capaz algo aburrido pero si te esperas ya esta despues para adelante es lo mejor. edit: esto va a ser epico papus
siento demasiada adrenalina al jugar este juego online, es demasiado bueno

Unlike any game I've ever played. Even portal.

Games A Little Overrated That Again I Didn't Grow Up In That Time Where Games Weren't Really A Thing. Still Really Fun And Good Story/Plot. Would Not Recommend For Someone Who Is Very Picky About Graphics.

This is my favorite FPS, as well as one of my favorite games of all time. The addictive yet simple combat, atmospheric music, engaging setting, and old, yet pleasing visuals always leave me to come back for playing this game over and over again. Half-Life was one of Valve's first games, but it's also still one of their best, and that says a lot.

I wish Bioshock got more praise instead of this outdated overrated boring fps

Highly Recommended and a classic.

This is far beyond my favourite Half Life game in my Library, I would recommend this to all of yous who are new to finding to this game. 

This game can include amazing physics, satisfying movements and mostly chaos which brings excitement to the client! This game can bring a great introduction when playing as Freemen in the train and being told about the instructions of Black Mesa and about it.

This game also delivers a amazing chaotic explosion as Gordon experiences a major issue to Black Mesa.

The game itself can open different easter eggs for example, GMan and others and lots of places to solve to find yourself out of Black Mesa and conversation to make with Scientists and Guards that have been through the incident. 

If yous heard of Half-Life, This is a great survival game for you to try and solve!
First time playing it. Absolutely love it.
most Amazing game ive ever played

If this is the only game and you have nothing other to play - give it a go.
Otherwise - boring, dragged out a bit too much. It's possible to have fun playing it, but I felt that half of my time was spent trying to figure out where to go to progress the game. Killing enemies isn't satisfying (as for example, in Doom 1993), the levels feel a bit bland and repetitive. Playing through is more tiresome than fun, although there were some good moments within. However, that is how I feel and that is my opinion about it.
It's a classic that has a ton of effort and soul put into it, but for me it didn't really age well. I can't really see myself completing it for a second time.

Este juego es realmente bueno, su historia es atrapante en todo momento y ademas, tienes la posibilidad de jugar online a muchos mini-juegos. A pesar de haber sido lanzado hace mas de 20 aÃ±os, sigue siendo un gran titulo. Sin duda, recomiendo probarlo.
